data.title: BU College of Engineering Leadership Advisory Board
data.meta_description: The Dean’s Engineering Leadership Advisory Board offers input on future directions, challenges and opportunities for the College.
data.text:
Dean’s Leadership Advisory Board

The ENG Dean’s Leadership Advisory Board (DLAB) is an advisory group of leading scientists, engineers, technologists, and business leaders with close ties to BU. The group advises the Dean on the College’s long-term strategic priorities, business plans, and key challenges, and helps to raise the profile of BU Engineering around the world.

Dean’s Leadership Advisory Board Members

Binoy Singh, M.D.* – Board Chair (2023-2026) – ENG ’89, EVP & Chief Medical Officer, Gentiva Health Services

Omar Ali*– ENG ’96, Director of Operations, Petra Engineering Industries Co.

Carla Boragno*, Former SVP, Global Head of Engineering & Facilities, Pharma Technical Operations, Genetech/Roche

Tye Brady* – ENG ’90, Chief Technologist, Amazon Robotics

Deborah Caplan* – ENG ’90, Former Executive VP, Human Resources & Corporate Services, NextEra Energy

Vanessa Feliberti* – ENG ’93, Corporate VP, M365 Services Platform Engineering, Microsoft

Mikhail Gurevich* – ENG ’07, Questrom’12, Managing Partner, Dominion Capital

Anand Krishnamurthy*^ – ENG ’92, ’96, President and CEO, Affirmed Networks, Inc.

Ezra Kucharz* – ENG ’90, President, Tull Investment Group

Abhijit Kulkarni*^ – ENG ’93, ’97, COO, Cellino Biotech Inc.

Tonie Leatherberry – ENG ’85, Board Member, Amfam, Inc.

Daniel Maneval* – ENG ’82, Nonclinical Biopharma Consultant

Kathleen McLaughlin* – ENG ’87, EVP & Chief Sustainability Officer, Walmart Inc.; President, Walmart Foundation

Manuel Mendez* – ENG ’91, CEO, AliveDx

Rao Mulpuri – ENG ’92, ’96, CEO, View Inc.

Girish Navani – ENG ’91, CEO, eClinical Works

Nirva Kapasi Patel* – ENG ’00, Executive Director, Animal Law & Policy Program, Harvard Law School

Sharad Rastogi* – ENG ’91, CEO, Work Dynamics Technology, JLL

Avanish Sahai* – ENG ’89, Mentor Capitalist, Exbourne Capital

Francis Troise* – ENG’87, President of Trading & Connectivity Solutions Division and Vice Chairman of Capital Markets, Broadridge Financial Solutions

Bill Weiss – ENG ’83, ‘97, VP of Manufacturing & Logistics, General Dynamics Mission Systems

* – indicates Industry Partnerships Task Force membership

^ – indicates Industry Partnerships Task Force Co-chair

Photo: May 2024 DLAB Meeting, courtesy of Dana J. Quigley, DJQ Media LLC.

Emeritus members, from Dean’s Leadership Advisory Board

John Abele, Founder & Director, Boston Scientific

Alan Auerbach– ENG ’91, Chairman, Founder, President & CEO, Puma Biotechnology

Roger Dorf – ENG ’70, Former VP, Wireless Group, Cisco Systems

Joe Healey – ENG ’88, Senior Managing Director, Healthcor Management LP

Venkatesh Narayanamurti – Professor & Former Dean, School of Engineering & Applied Sciences, Harvard University

Richard Reidy – SMG ’82, Former President and CEO, Progress Software Corp.

John Tegan, III – ENG ’88, President and CEO, Communication Technology Services
